title: Autism Research & Treatment
cleaned_text: Autism Research & Treatment About These Videos These videos, produced by [Emory Photography & Video](http://photo.emory.edu), highlight Emory's extensive work in researching and treating autism. Adults With Autism Joseph Cubells, M.D., Ph.D. 4:47 Autism Lese Martin, Ph.D., F.A.C.M.G. 4:00 Credits These videos were produced by Emory Photography & Video.
